reference.shortdesc: The msgph element is a message phrase that contains the text content of a message produced by an application or program.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element can also contain a variable name (varname) element to illustrate where variable text content can occur in the message. This element is part of the DITA software domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document software tasks, concepts and reference information.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message, informational: successful.
